A

addBallot(Ballot) - Method in class Candidate
This method adds a ballot object to the list of assigned ballots.
addBallotToList(String) - Method in class Election
This method creates a new ballot object created from a line from the files containing the ballots, and adds it to the ballot list.

B

Ballot - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Ballot(LinkedHashSet<Candidate>, String) - Constructor for class Ballot
The ballot constructor takes in the candidates on the ballot and a vote line from a csv file.
breakTie(ArrayList<Candidate>) - Method in class Plurality
breakTie will take in a list of Candidate objects who have been determined to have a tie in their total vote counts.
breakTie(List<Candidate>) - Method in class STV
Chooses the overall loser of this round of vote distribution from a list of tied losers.

C

calcDroopQuota() - Method in class STV
Calculates the Droop quota using the formula: floor(numBallots/(numSeats+1)) + 1 If the number of seats is 0 or less, defaults to 1.
Candidate - Class in <Unnamed>
Candidate Class
candidates - Variable in class Election
 
confirmInput(String) - Static method in class UI
This method is ran after all election prompts have gone.
createBallotList() - Method in class Election
This method is responsible for creating the original ballot list, by reading each ballot from files and creating new ballot objects.

This method will take a the list of ballots that was set in the constructor.
distributeVotes() - Method in class STV
Distributes the current set of ballots among the remaining candidates.
